articles.title: Solar Orbiter spacecraft takes its closest look at the sun - Space.com
articles.description: The European Solar Orbiter spacecraft will make its closest approach to the sun on Saturday morning, getting to one third of the sun-Earth distance.

articles.title: Europe and the U.S. Make Ambitious Plans to Reduce Reliance on Russian Gas - The New York Times
